Package qlang.runtime.errors

package qlang.runtime.errors
  • Class
    Description
    Problem
    The Problem class represents runtime exceptions that occur during the execution of Q language code.
    RVal
    The RVal class represents a runtime exception specific to Q language.
    Tip
    The Tip class represents a tip system providing suggestions when errors occur.
